content.title: Starlink Ready For India, Will Help In Rural Connectivity: Elon Musk
content.body: Here is what's happening today: Starlink satellites orbit at about 550 kilometres, far lower than traditional geostationary satellites, making their faster response times more beneficial for disaster areas.
